description.oldValue:
,New Graph APIs that allow developers to work directly with Content Types and align with content type synchronization enhancements, by enabling them to fetch and sync published content types present in content type hub site to a target site. Currently available in preview.
GA date: April CY2022
Preview date: January CY2022
description.newValue: ,New Graph APIs that allow developers to work directly with Content Types and align with content type synchronization enhancements, by enabling them to fetch and sync published content types present in content type hub site to a target site. Currently available in preview.
